name: AlphaGene
description:
-How to play:

  • Find females bring them to your base.
  • Beat em up to make childrem.
  • If you die, you'll take control of your oldest child.
  • To win you need to exterminate the other genes.

-Controls

  • Move: W/A/S/D/Arrows
  • Attack: Space/LeftMouse
  • Release Female: E/RightMouse
  • Statistic: TAB

-You can play with friends, connecting all devices to the same PC hotspot, or if you don't have any,  you can play with bots.
